channel.title: Suggestion
channel.description:
o hai lol
I think the quiz you have to pass to be able to post should be harder...there are still way too many noobs. And I also think you should prune everyone below 20 posts....
kthx?

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:5, topic:65255”]Haha, I was going to say something, but now I can’t. Why couldn’t your post be correlated to your title of this thread?

Mopar said he doesn’t want to delete inactive users.[/quote]
Well, if everyone was like mopar’s choices, the world would be full of noobs needing to listen to a recording of “Breath in, Breathe out.” allday. Luckily, that’s just an imaginary situation

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=".Fusion (usernamelol), post:3, topic:65255"][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=94828.msg981391#msg981391 date=1173256789]
DAmn it. misleading topic name I’m gana rape you with a stork damnit.

[ontopic]I think that people that are below 5 posts that have been registered for over a month should be deleted and that there should be some type of spelling test in the quiz.[/ontopic]
[/quote]
Google and firefox do spelling for you :([/quote]

All the more reason to weed out those who can’t.

Read full topic
